mapper.select: select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo FROM rboard bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no ORDER BY bo.no desc

select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo ,bo.group_no as groupNo ,bo.order_no as orderNo ,bo.depth FROM rboard bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and bo.no = #{int}

select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo FROM board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY bo.no desc
